main.name: Clare Jackson
main.description: As a student a Lambda School studying Full Stack Web Development, I am excited to learn and grow with the exciting advancements in my field. I am ready to work with a team that will make an impact in the forward movement of our society and the world.
main.bio: I have moved my way through learning HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, Redux, Context API and various testing, like Jest, RTL and Cypress. In working with H&R Block as a Field Systems Technician, I have experience with network systems, routers, POS systems, servers and more office hardware, plus remote troubleshooting.
main.contactmessage: I am so excited to start researching my first projects. Any ideas you are excited about too!

testimonials.text: Clare is always my first call when anything needs to be done in that district. Being an FST, she is knowledgeable regarding current issues, and as an OS, she is willing to get things done. Lately she has been challenging herself to do more plan ahead work to set a schedule for work we know that needs to be done and being flexible enough to handle the extras that pop-up. She has done an amazing job of balancing life and work during the pandemic and consistently rises to the task. I could not succeed without her. Clare is a shining example of our company goals of Better Together, Determined, Passionate and Creative. Thank you to everything that you do!
